Title: Relates to prohibiting peace officers from carrying firearms
Summary: Prohibits peace officers from carrying firearms for any purpose during the scope of their employment other than to dispose of such firearm.
LawCode: Amd ยง2.20, CP L; amd ยง400.00, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the penal law, in relation to prohibiting peace officers from carrying firearms
